articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Apartment Houses for Educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Apartment Houses for Educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of  the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the completed apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					 Watching with satisfaction the twin 46-storyed apartment houses, he noted with pleasure that they look like sailing ships on the River Taedong and they are attractive as their outer walls are covered with heat ray reflection glass.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction, saying that the apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology are the structures which reflect the WPK's idea of  attaching importance to education and talents and splendid edifices which have a perfect harmony of  the Juche character and national identity, originality, convenience and formative art and a great icon demonstrating before the world the daily developing  architecture of Songun Korea.
					
					 He acquainted himself in detail with their construction, going round flat No.1 on the fourth floor at the entrance No. 1 of the apartment houses and flat No. 1 on the 45th floor of the apartment houses and shops, restaurants, etc. built on the ground floor.
					
					 He said with pleasure that flats have good and convenient cupboards, bookshelves, sofas, beds and other quality furniture and fixtures provided by the party and if color TV sets are added to them, not only educators but their wives and children will  like them  very much. 
					
					 He was pleased that a geothermal cooling and heating system has been introduced into the apartment houses so that settlers can live in cool rooms in summer and in warm rooms in winter.
					
					 He repeatedly and highly praised the soldier-builders of a guards unit and hero unit for successfully completing the apartment houses. He extended the KPA supreme commander's thanks to KPA unit 267 for performing new miracles and feats as pace-setters of the times.
					
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of Pyongyang City taking on more magnificent and modern looks as the days go by on the 45th floor, he set forth tasks and ways of turning the Mirae Scientists Street being built along the bank of the River Taedong into a world-class scientists street.
					
					 He told officials to let educators quickly move into new flats as they were completed as intended by the party, asking them to convey without fail his best wishes to teachers and researchers for their pleasant and happy life in their new flats. He promised to visit their families in the future.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C. C., the WPK, and Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C. C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam to Visit African Countries
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam to Visit African Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, will soon pay official goodwill visits to some African countries including Ethiopia, Sudan and Congo.

articles.title: U.S. Plan to Use Nuclear Weapons on Korean Peninsula Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. Plan to Use Nuclear Weapons on Korean Peninsula Blasted
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Pan-national Committee for Emergency Measures against North-targeted Nuclear War Exercises released a statement Friday in connection with the recent disclosure of another U.S. reckless scenario for a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					 By opening to public its plan for the use of nuclear weapons the U.S. has become unable to deny any longer that the large-scale anti-DPRK war exercises which it stages every year with the south Korean puppet forces under the pretext of "annual defensive exercises" are nuclear war drills for putting into practice the scenario for nuclear attack on the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Lurking behind the plan for the use of nuclear weapons against the DPRK is the U.S. sinister purpose to highlight "nuclear threat from the north", keep the puppet warmongers bound more tightly to the military alliance for aggression and thus hurl them as nuclear war servants and a shock brigade for a war of aggression against the north and introduce THAAD into south Korea in order to turn the Korean Peninsula into a nuclear outpost and a bridgehead for realizing its Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 Another aim sought by the U.S. in opening to public the scenario is to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost by chilling the hard-won atmosphere for dialogue between the north and the south, bringing the north-south relations back to the phase of catastrophe and more frantically kicking up the bankrupt anti-DPRK nuclear racket.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are the chief criminals posing nuclear threat to the Korean Peninsula and working hard to provoke a war on it.
					
					 The army of the DPRK which has grown up to be invincible elite force equipped with powerful nukes under the wise guidance of the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu and the Korean people, their hearts burning with towering hatred, will resolutely foil the U.S. reckless attempt to use nukes with nuclear weapons of justice. 
					
					 All the Koreans in the north, the south and overseas and the world peace-loving people should never tolerate the moves stepped up by the U.S. and its followers to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK under the pretext of "nuclear threat from the north" behind the scene of dialogue and peace but turn out as one in the action to frustrate those moves.

articles.title: CPRK Blasts Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks against DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Blasts Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks against DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Friday lashing out at the chief executive of south Korea for letting loose a spate of invectives against the DPRK at the Asia-Europe summit:
					 Park Geun Hye again made reckless remarks against the DPRK during her recent foreign trip.
					
					 At the Asia-Europe summit held in Milano, Italy she blustered that "the north should make a true change, dismantle nukes and open the closed door." Ballyhooing about "human rights and hard living of inhabitants of the north," she jabbered that "the north should approach dialogue with sincerity away from double-dealing tactics."
					
					 This is another unpardonable politically-motivated provocation to the DPRK and grave outbursts chilling the atmosphere of the hard-won north-south dialogue.
					
					 As the reality proves, it is the U.S. which poses substantial nuclear threat to the DPRK and it is again the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces which are making desperate efforts to isolate and close the DPRK while talking about "sanctions".
					
					 The U.S. plan for using nuclear weapons disclosed in a memoir of former U.S. Secretary of Defense Panetta clearly proves who poses a nuclear threat and evidently tells the nuclear threat from whom should be defused, first of all, to denuclearize the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Nevertheless, she feigned ignorance of the nuclear threat of her U.S. master and talked about "nuclear threat" of fellow countrymen, shameless sophism.
					
					 Moreover, she turned south Korea into the world's worst tundra of human rights and drove people's living into dire destitution and caused all sorts of tragedies such as the ferry Sewol disaster, becoming the target of all people's condemnation. She has, therefore, no face to talk about "human rights" of someone and "pain of inhabitants."
					
					 She is talking about dialogue while slandering the other side behind the scene. This is a height of double-dealing attitude.
					
					 If she is to have dialogue with the north and improve relations with it, she should know how to observe elementary etiquette toward the other side, first of all.
					
					 If Park sincerely wants north-south dialogue and improve relations, she should refrain from making remarks obstructive to them, to begin with.
					
					 She had better clearly know that she may bring inter-Korean relations to total collapse due to her bad habit of wrongly waging her tongue.

articles.title: Hostile Forces' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Slammed
articles.content:
Hostile Forces' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies issued the following statement on Friday:
					 The report of the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies which most comprehensively and correctly reflects the human rights performance of the DPRK where the people have become masters of the country was distributed as an official document of the UN General Assembly, UN Security Council and UN Human Rights Council.
					
					 As already reported, no sooner had the report which historically, systematically and comprehensively deals with the nature of the socialist system of the DPRK centered on the popular masses, its policy of ensuring human rights and the people's enjoyment of human rights been published than it commanded strong support and deep sympathy of the international community.
					
					 Many media of the world gave wide publicity to the full text or main contents of the report and widely reported about the briefings clarifying the human rights performance and stand of the DPRK held in New York and various other places.
					
					 Many countries are appreciating the report as a document which comprehensively deals with the advantageous human rights performance in the DPRK and responding with keen interest to its efforts to further promote its people's enjoyment of human rights and boost international cooperation.
					
					 Meanwhile, they are ridiculing and accusing the "report of the Commission of Inquiry" on the human rights situation in the DPRK worked out with its speculation and hostility plus the individual "testimonies" made by such swindlers as "defectors from the north" without any mention of the policies and social system of the DPRK and its will and efforts for international cooperation to protect and promote genuine human rights.
					
					 The anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" EU, Japan and other hostile forces are trying to bring up for discussion at the UN General Assembly is a typical politicization, selectivity and double standards. So, there are voices expressing views that those countries desirous of protection and promotion of genuine human rights should oppose this and will do so.
					
					 But, the U.S.-led forces hostile to the DPRK are persistently working to deliberately downplay the report of the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies and draw attention to the bankrupt "report of the Commission of Inquiry."
					
					 This proves that their moves were prompted by their black-hearted intention to prevent the reality of the DPRK and its just assertions from being known to the world, tarnish the image of the DPRK and, furthermore, bring down its social system. It once again proves the truth that human rights precisely mean sovereignty.
					
					 If the popular masses are to enjoy genuine human rights, they must firmly defend the sovereignty of the country before anything else, and it is necessary to strongly react to the hostile forces attempting to meddle in the internal affairs of other countries under the signboard of "human rights." This is the conclusion drawn by the DPRK.
					
					 The politicization, selectivity, and double standards to abuse human rights, the universal value of mankind, for a sinister political purpose should never be tolerated.
					
					 The vicious and base human rights racket of the hostile forces against the DPRK is lashing the Korean people into great fury.
					
					 The DPRK will decisively frustrate the persistent anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign of the hostile forces and continue to make utmost efforts to firmly defend the best Korean-style socialist system and provide better conditions for the people's enjoyment of human rights.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Chinese President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Chinese President
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, received a reply message from Xi Zinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China (PRC) and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC, Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council of the PRC, and Zhang Dejiang, chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC, on Oct. 13.
					 The message said:
					
					 We express thanks to you for sending a message of greeting on the occasion of the 65th founding anniversary of the PRC.
					
					 We wish the DPRK prosperity and the Korean people happiness.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association.
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned on Thursday by Vice-Chairman of the association Trinh Tuan Tong, head of its delegation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Woolen Tapestry, Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mongolia
articles.content:
Woolen Tapestry, Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mongolia
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- On display at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK is a woolen tapestry, presented to leader Kim Jong Il as a gift by a delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party which visited Pyongyang in October 1980 to attend the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and the celebrations of its 35th birthday.
					 The tapestry features a young man on a galloping white horse with a fluttering red flag in his hand. In its lower part are double white thread-woven tassel and its girth is decorated with traditional patterns.
					
					 It is 130 centimeters long by 98 wide.
					
					 The gift represents the Mongolians' deep reverence for Kim Jong Il who perfectly personified the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and wisely led the revolutionary cause of Juche to victory through his unique ideo-theoretical activities.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Maritime Territorial branch of the United Russia Party led by Lyudmila Talabaeva, secretary of the Regional Political Council, left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Wisong Scientists Residential Quarter Completed
articles.content:
Wisong Scientists Residential Quarter Completed 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The modern Wisong Scientists Residential Quarter was built in the Unjong science area on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The Wisong Scientists Residential Quarter is the great creation of the WPK's idea and policy of attaching importance to science and talents to build on this land a highly civilized socialist nation and the most powerful country in the world envied by the whole world by dint of science and technology.
					
					 The residential quarter has multi-storeyed apartment houses of 24 blocks, schools, hospital, nursery, kindergarten, various welfare service facilities and other public buildings and parks. It is an icon of construction of residential quarter in the new century as it fully abides by the principle of convenience and architectural beauty first.
					
					 There took place a ceremony of marking the completion of the residential quarter on Friday. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials concerned, those of the State Academy of Sciences, service personnel of the People's Army and people who participated in the construction and scientists expected to move to the new flats. 
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made an address. 
					
					 He said that it is a great auspicious event of the country that the modern scientists residential quarter reminiscent of a city was built in the Unjong science area to successfully decorate this year featured as a period of great prosperity in construction. 
					
					 The residential quarter is a great creation produced by might of the army-people joint operation in which the army played a major and core role, Pak said, and went on:
					
					 Scientists and officials of the State Academy of Sciences should live up to the warm love and deep trust of the WPK, which provided them with modern dwelling houses and excellent research conditions, with great scientific and technological achievements. 
					
					 Officials and workers in the field of construction should bring about a great surge and innovations in every construction site to build more monumental edifices in the Songun era such as the Wisong Scientists Residential Quarter. 
					
					 Representatives of scientists and builders cut the tape, marking the completion of the residential quarter. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the residential quarter.

articles.title: 3rd DPRK-China Economy, Trade, Culture and Tourism Expo Opens
articles.content:
3rd DPRK-China Economy, Trade, Culture and Tourism Expo Opens
						
 Dandong, October 16 (KCNA Correspondent) -- The 3rd DPRK-China economy, trade, culture and tourism expo opened in Dandong, China.
					 Such events as trade fair, fine arts exhibition, photo exhibition on tourism and art performance will take place during the expo.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at a gymnasium in Dandong on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Bing Zhigang, vice-governor of Liaoning Province, China, and other officials of the party, government, culture and trade of the province and the city, Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai and staff members of his embassy and the diplomatic corps in Pyongyang.
					
					 Also on hand were members of the DPRK delegation taking part in the expo led by Hong Kil Nam, vice-chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, Kim Kwang Hun, DPRK consul general in Shenyang, and Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Then, an art performance was given by the art troupe of North Phyongan Province of the DPRK.

articles.title: Emblem of 19th World Taekwon-Do Championships Executed
articles.content:
Emblem of 19th World Taekwon-Do Championships Executed
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- An emblem and a figurative animal design for the 19th World Taekwon-Do Championships have been produced in the DPRK.
					 Printed on the emblem and design are the name, venue and year of the championships in Korean and English.
					
					 Also depicted are number "19", Taekwon-Do kick movement and a tiger in Taekwon-Do uniform making straight punch.
					
					 The championships will take place in Pyongyang from August 24 to September 1, Juche 104 (2015). Pyongyang hosted the 8th World Taekwon-Do Championships in 1992, the 17th World Taekwon-Do Championships in 2011 and the 5th World Juvenile Taekwon-Do Championships in 2000.
					
					 Ri Yong Son, secretary general of the Championships Organizing Committee, told KCNA that diverse preparatory works are going on for the successful championships.

articles.title: Premier League Football Matches under Way in DPRK
articles.content:
Premier League Football Matches under Way in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Premier league football matches for the DPRK Championships, started on September 20, are going on, drawing attention of experts and fans.
					 Taking part in the league matches are 12 men's and 12 women's teams.
					
					 The match between Sonbong Team and April 25 Team ended 2:1 on September 26 and the match between Kigwancha Team and Amnokgang Team 3:2 on September 30 in men's event. And Sobaeksu Team defeated April 25 Team 1:0 on October 4 in women's event. All those results were unexpected.
					
					 As of October 16, Hwaebul, April 25 and Amnokgang teams are taking the lead in men's event while Sobaeksu, Amnokgang and Pyongyang teams in women's event.
					
					 The premier league football matches will run till October 29.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Accomplishing Revolutionary Cause of Juche
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Accomplishing Revolutionary Cause of Juche
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 88th anniversary of the formation of Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Papers Friday editorially say that DIU is the root of the Workers' Party of Korea, origin of Songun, model of unity and banner of victory of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The papers call upon all Koreans to dynamic advance for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, holding higher the flag of DIU which fluttered during the long journey of the revolution under the leadership of the great party.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed immortal feats by wisely leading the revolutionary cause of Juche to successfully realize the idea of DIU for a long period, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The shining history of succession of the Korean revolution created by holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem at its head is being given a steady continuity by Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the peerless great man who is successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered under the banner of DIU.
					
					 Under the tested leadership of Kim Jong Un the history and tradition of the single-minded unity established by DIU are being successfully inherited in the new century of Juche and the Korean revolution is advancing straight along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 There are many ways in advance but the way of DIU is the only one to be covered by the Korean revolutionaries.
					
					 Minju Joson says that only victory and glory are always in store for the service personnel and people of the DPRK as there are the outstanding Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un and the great tradition of DIU.

articles.title: DIU Formed by Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
DIU Formed by Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- It has been 88 years since the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) by President Kim Il Sung on October 17, Juche 15 (1926).
					 The formation of the DIU was a historic event declaring the fresh start of the Korean revolution as it was a Juche-type revolutionary organization, quite distinctive from existing ones in name, character, action program and other aspects.
					
					 Kim Il Sung clarified the path of the Korean revolution in its platform after making an accurate analysis of socio-economic situation and class correlation in Korea with deep insight into cherished desire of the Korean people at the time when Korea was under the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The members of the DIU were youth revolutionaries free from factionalism and flunkeyism and later, they played a key role in founding the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 With the formation of the DIU as a momentum, the Korean national liberation movement began to advance along the road of independence.
					
					 The principle of independence maintained by the DIU has been successfully carried on by the WPK as its main principle in its building and activities.

articles.title: Stop to Suppression of Progressive Organization Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Suppression of Progressive Organization Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea released a commentary on Tuesday demanding the regime stop clamping down upon it.
					 The commentary recalled that on Tuesday the Seoul Central District Court admitted the innocence of the co-representative of the Seoul branch of the organization who had been suppressed by the ill-famed "Security Law".
					
					 This clearly proved the legitimacy of the organization which has called for termination of war drills, abrogation of alliance with the U.S. and withdrawal of U.S. troops from south Korea, it noted, adding:
					
					 The security authorities are working hard to check the activities of the organization by labeling it illegal one "benefiting the enemy" but it can no longer work.
					
					 The Intelligence Service's forcible search of the organization and the prosecution's groundless indictment were prompted by the aim to weaken the organization's campaign for checking the construction of the naval base on Jeju Island.
					
					 The commentary urged the prosecution to stop such a reckless repressive racket.
					
					 Suppression of the movement for peace and reunification and groundless racket for "eliminating followers of the north" should be halted, the commentary held.

articles.title: Conservative Media of S. Korea Censured
articles.content:
Conservative Media of S. Korea Censured
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on Oct. 11 made public a statement rapping the conservative media of south Korea for their anachronistic campaign against the "followers of the north".
					 The statement said that a conservative internet website branded organizations of Koreans in the U.S. which held a meeting demanding the probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster as "organizations following the north" and those participants as violators of the "Security Law".
					
					 The statement noted it is intolerable to term the Koreans in the U.S. who took part in the meeting criminals. 
					
					 It is a serious problem to assert that the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. was the one that "manipulated the meeting behind the scene", it stressed, adding:
					
					 The conservative media are deliberately releasing misinformation labeling the federation "force following the north". 
					
					 All Koreans are enraged by the "government's" attitude towards the ferry Sewol disaster. The true aim of the campaign is to cover up the truth. 
					
					 The conservative media should cancel the false articles and make an apology to the Federation and Koreans in the U.S. and stop acting a stooge in the "government's" campaign to eliminate the "followers of the north". 
					
					 Koreans in the U.S. will struggle till a special law for probing the truth behind the disaster is instituted.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations of political parties and figures of various circles paid congratulatory visits to DPRK embassies in their countries from October 4 to 10 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th anniversary of the foundation of the WPK.
					 They included the delegation of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United), chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, chairman and general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), presi
					
					 dent of the Workers' Party of Peru, president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, curator of the Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru, chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy and the secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their full-length figure pictures and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The head of the delegation of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said that the WPK founded and developed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il has strikingly demonstrated its might as an ever-victorious and steel-strong party which achieved the invincible unity and cohesion under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Meanwhile, foreign political parties and personages sent floral baskets and bouquets to the DPRK embassies in their countries on October 7 and 10.
					
					 They included the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, the general secretary of the Sind State Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party, the president of the Socialist Party of Benin and the chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association.

articles.title: Birthday of Workers' Party of Korea Marked by Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
Birthday of Workers' Party of Korea Marked by Foreign Political Parties
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held by foreign political parties between Oct. 6 and 9 in celebration of the 69th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Those were the Nakhodka City Branch of Maritime Territory of the United Russia Party, the Vienna, 21 County Committee of the Communist Party of Austria, and the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran.
					
					 The secretary of the Regional Political Council of the Nakhodka City Branch of Maritime Territory of the United Russia Party said:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung the WPK firmly maintained its independent stand and pursued policies for the people. So it has always emerged victorious, enjoying the popular masses' absolute support and trust.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il achieved the unity and cohesion of the whole party around the leader for the first time in history, thus developing the WPK into the invincible party.
					
					 The WPK is winning victory after victory as the great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's party under the outstanding leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Heinrich Gruber, coordinator of the Vienna, 21 County Committee of the Communist Party of Austria, and other speakers said that the Korean people have kept to the road of socialism under the leadership of the WPK, which represents and protects the interests of the masses, since the President founded the WPK.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK was another great event in the history of the party, he expressed the conviction that the WPK and the Korean people would successfully accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The director of the education department of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran said that the future of the DPRK will be brighter thanks to the leadership of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korea Should Be Reunified by Federal Formula: Polish Body
articles.content:
Korea Should Be Reunified by Federal Formula: Polish Body
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Korea should be reunified by founding a federal republic while leaving the differing ideas and social systems in the north and the south of Korea as they are, free from foreign forces' interference in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself, said the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in an article posted on its website on Oct. 4.
					 The article said:
					
					 The publication of the October 4 declaration manifested all Koreans' desire to put an end to the division and confrontation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The declaration indicates the ways of boosting the cooperation and exchange between the north and the south of Korea and ensuring peace on the peninsula and achieving the co-prosperity of the nation in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 However, the present south Korean regime is going against the desire and expectation of the Korean nation, negating the above-said declarations.
					
					 Although the government of the DPRK set forth proposals for reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south, the south Korean regime negated them and is more recklessly resorting to the anti-DPRK campaign.
					
					 The "unification by absorption" sought by the south Korean regime is an anachronistic daydream as it is contrary to the spirit of the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Brazilian Political Party Backs Proposal to Found Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo
articles.content:
Brazilian Political Party Backs Proposal to Found Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo
						
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Genuine Democratic Movement of Brazil on Oct. 9 issued a statement titled "Korea should be reunified according to the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo".
					 The statement said:
					
					 At the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on Oct. 10, 1980 President Kim Il Sung advanced the proposal for reunifying Korea by founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					
					 The federal formula is a most peaceful one for reunification without reason of conflict and danger of war as it calls for leaving the two differing ideologies and social systems as they are in a reunified federal state.
					
					 If the federal formula is in force, the north and the south will further promote mutual understanding, strengthen the national reconciliation and unity and put an end to the division of the country caused by foreign forces.
					
					 If the federal formula is enforced and national unity is achieved, this will greatly contribute to defusing the tension on the Korean Peninsula and achieving the peace and security of the world.
					
					 We fully support the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, recognizing it as a patriotic and reasonable one for Korea's reunification.
					
					 We call upon all peace- and justice-loving political parties and organizations and nations of the world to fully support Korea's reunification by federal formula.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- There took place events in different countries to mark the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 Meetings, lectures, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Iran, Malaysia, Guinea and Angola between Oct. 3 and 7.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un documenting their party-building leadership feats and Songun leadership feats.
					
					 Also on display were photos showing the true picture of the WPK.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Monument to Party Founding".
					
					 The president of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran said that the WPK founded by the President and led by H.E. Kim Jong Il developed into a guiding force of the Korean people.
					
					 He hoped the Korean people would register greater successes in the efforts to building a thriving nation under the leadership of the WPK headed by H.E. Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The director of a Malaysian company said that the WPK founded by the President is the most powerful party in the world which represents the interests of the working people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Russian Website
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was posted on "Khabinfo. ru", website of the Khabarovsk Territory of Russia, on October 7.
					 The work, made public on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea in which it explored a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and serves as a great programme for the party building and activities as it indicates the ways of developing the party into his party for all ages.
					
					 The website carried photos of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed in Peru
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed in Peru
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian national meeting took place in Lima on October 9 to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were personages of political parties and organizations and other people of Peru.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, said: The foundation of the WPK and the course of its development serve as a noble model for us who are struggling for the sovereignty and the people's happiness.
					
					 The secretary general of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism who doubles as chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il noted that the party-building exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who founded the great Juche idea and built and strengthened the revolutionary party of Juche on its basis will be immortal.
					
					 The leading function and role of the WPK in the revolution and construction are being developed onto a high level thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, the great successor to the cause of Juche, the cause of Songun, he said, adding:
					
					 The revolutionary parties of the world should learn from the model of the WPK.
					
					 Roberto Carbonel Pezo, chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for the Study of the Juche-based Songun Policy, said that the WPK would as ever win victory after victory as it gives top priority to the interests of the popular masses and absolutely defends their interests.
					
					 Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, noted that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the most revolutionary and independent party, adding that their party-building exploits are being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre viviendas para educadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre viviendas para educadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek
						
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las viviendas para educadores de  la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek recien levantadas.
					Al mirar con satisfaccion los rascacielos de 46 pisos de dos edificios senalo que parecen como un barco de velas flotado en el rio Taedong y son vistosos estos edificios en cuyas paredes exteriores estan pegados vidrios reflectores de rayo solar.
					
					Expreso gran satisfecho de que las viviendas  reflejan la idea de nuestro partido de dar  importancia a la educacion y a los talentosos y demuestran armoniosamente el espiritu Juche, la nacionalidad, la originalidad, la comodidad y el caracter plastico y son una gran obra que exalta a todo el mundo el arte arquitectonico de la Corea del Songun en desarrollo cada dia mas.
					
					Al recorrer la casa no.1 de 5o piso y el no.1 de 46o piso de la primera entrada de la vivienda, la tienda y el restaurante construidos en la parte de la base se entero detalladamente del estado de la obra.
					
					Dijo alegremente que estan dotados de muebles y utensilios incluyendo armario, armario para libros, sofa y cama enviados por el partido y agrego que si se instala hasta TV en color los educadores, las amas y los ninos gustarian mucho.
					
					Subrayo que le gusta mucho el que al aplicar el sistema de calefaccion y enfriamiento con la geotermia los educadores pueden vivir en  verano en el ambiente fresco y en invierno en el templado.
					
					Volvio a evaluar altamente que los constructores militares de la unidad vanguardia y heroica hayan culminado magnificamente la construccion de estas viviendas y les dio agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC a la unidad no.267 del EPC que crea en la delantera de la epoca nuevos milagros y proezas.
					
					Al mirar en 46o piso el panorama de la ciudad de Pyongyang que se cambia hermosamente cada dia presento las tareas y los remedios para convertir la avenida de los cientificos Mirae que se construye en la costa del rio Taedong en la de cientificos de talla mundial.
					
					Instruyo hacer pronto la mudanza a las viviendas construidas conforme al proposito del partido y prometio que visitara sin falta en el futuro a los familiares diciendo que les transmitan a los profesores e investigadores su deseo de que vivan alegre y felizmente en las nuevas casas.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario Choe Ryong Hae y el jefe de departamento Han Kwang Sang, del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam visitara paises africanos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam visitara paises africanos
						
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, realizara pronto una visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Federal Democratica de Etiopia, la Republica de Sudan, la Republica de Congo y otros paises africanos.

articles.title: Portavoz de entidad antibelica de RPDC publica declaracion
articles.content:
Portavoz de entidad antibelica de RPDC publica declaracion
						
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que quedo revelado otra vez la imprudente designio de Estados Unidos de provocar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, el portavoz del Comite Pannacional de Medidas Emergentes contra los Ejercicios de Guerra Nuclear anti-Norte hizo publica el dia 17 una declaracion que senala en particular:
					Al publicarse el plan de uso de armas nucleares, el pais norteamericano no puede menos de negar por mas tiempo que los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC de gran envergadura, que se desarrollan junto con los titeres surcoreanos bajo el pretexto de los "ejercicios anuales de defensa", son el entrenamiento de guerra nuclear para llevar a la practica el plan de ataque nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					La publicacion del presente plan parte de una intencion malsana de atar mas los belicistas surcoreanos al sistema de alianza militar de caracter agresivo dando destaque a la "amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea", usarlos como lacayo de guerra y la brigada de choque de guerra contra la RPDC y convertir la Peninsula Coreana en una base nuclear avanzada y trampolin para realizar la estrategia de Asia y el Pacifico al ubicar en el Sur de Corea los misiles interceptores THAAD.
					
					Ademas, alli esta ocultada la peligrosa intencion de desalentar el clima de dialogo entre ambas partes coreanas preparado dificilmente y llevar otra vez las relaciones intercoreanas al punto catastrofico y recurrir mas a los alborotos nucleares anti-RPDC para desencadenar a toda costa la agresion y la guerra.
					
					EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos son los autores principales que tratan de provocar la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana amenazandola con las armas nucleares.
					
					El ejercito preparado como invencible ejercito selecto con las poderosas armas nucleares bajo la destacada direccion del genial comandante del monte Paektu y el pueblo coreano lleno de hostilidad y odio, frustraran tajantemente con la justa espada nuclear la intencion imprudente de EE.UU. de usar las armas nucleares 
					
					Toda la nacion coreana del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, asi como los pueblos amantes de la paz mundial no deben perdonar jamas las maniobras de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras encaminadas a provocar la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC detras de la cortina del dialogo y la paz bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza nuclear del Norte" y levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha por detenerlas y frustrarlas.

articles.title: Inaugurado reparto de viviendas de cientificos Wisong
articles.content:
Inaugurado reparto de viviendas de cientificos Wisong
						
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 69o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se construyo el reparto de modernas viviendas de cientificos Wisong en la zona de cientificos de Unjong.
					  El nuevo reparto es una creacion de la politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de dar importancia a la ciencia y a los talentos para construir sobre esta tierra con el poderio de la ciencia y la tecnica el pais civilizado socialista admirado por todo el mundo.
					
					 Es formado por 24 apartamentos de varias plantas, escuelas, hospital, guarderia, jardin infantil, edificios publicos como establecimientos de servicios publicos y parques.
					
					Resulta el modelo de construccion de los repartos de ese tipo en el nuevo siglo que materializo cabalmente el principio de dar prioridad a la comodidad y a la estetica.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 17 la ceremonia inaugural del reparto.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin y los funcionarios interesados, los de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los trabajadores que participaron en la construccion y los cientificos que se mudaran a nuevas viviendas.
					
					  El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  El dijo que es un gran jubilo de todo el pais la inauguracion de este reparto equivalente a una ciudad entera en la zona de cientificos de Unjong, la cual corona este ano de prosperidad para la construccion.
					
					  Prosiguio que el reparto deviene gran creacion que hizo el Ejercito Popular de Corea desempenando el papel protagonico en los trabajos conjuntos entre los militares y civiles.
					
					  Subrayo que los cientificos y funcionarios de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias deben recompensar con altos exitos cientifico-tecnicos los grandes beneficios y confianza del Partido que les ofrecio estas modernas viviendas y excelentes condiciones de investigacion.
					
					Destaco que los funcionarios de la rama de construccion y los trabajadores tienen que construir muchas creaciones monumentales de la epoca del Songun como este reparto, al producir grandes saltos e innovaciones en cada lugar de construccion.
					
					Los delegados de cientificos y constructores cortaron la cinta de inauguracion.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia inaugural, los participantes recorrieron el reparto.
